doctext: the police have reported in hua ##nca ##yo , located 315 km east of lima , that alleged terrorists today killed dolores hi ##nos ##tro ##za , the mayor of mu ##l ##qui district . hi ##nos ##tro ##za , who was at home , was shot five times . hi ##nos ##tro ##za ' s children told police that four hooded individuals broke into the house and shot their mother after having insulted her . the killers also shouted slogan ##s supporting the armed struggle . dolores hi ##nos ##tro ##za , 48 years old , did not belong to any political party . she is the second woman mayor killed this week by alleged commando groups of the mao ##ist shining path .
